title: Presentation: Built to Outlast: Cultivating a Culture of Resilience
description: Kathleen Vignos shares three defining moments from her career, offering valuable lessons on navigating job loss, embracing continuous learning, and leading through organizational chaos. This talk provides actionable insights on building personal, technical, and organizational resilience to remain relevant and effective in the evolving tech landscape, including the impact of AI. By Kathleen Vignos
author: Kathleen Vignos
excerpt: Kathleen Vignos explains key strategies for software leaders to navigate uncertainty and build lasting careers.
